column2: Between 1879 & 1915, this N.Y. city had 3 different pro baseball teams somewhat redundantly called the Bisons
column4: In the 1950s Washington, D.C. had a NBA team called this, like the current NHL team but spelled -ols
column6: From 1974 to 1976, this city had a pro basketball team called the "Spirits of" it
column8: The Stapletons briefly brought NFL action to this NYC island borough
column10: In 1914 & 1915 the Terrapins repped this town in baseball's upstart Federal League
